title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 2 points:

1 point: For stating a minimum at x = 3.

1 point: For correct justification

f'(x) < 0 for 0 < x < 3 and f'(x) > 0 for x > 3

Therefore, f has a relative minimum at x = 3.
descriptions:
The response earns none of the following points:

1 point: For stating a minimum at x = 3.

1 point: For correct justification

f'(x) < 0 for 0 < x < 3 and f'(x) > 0 for x > 3

Therefore, f has a relative minimum at x = 3.

The response earns one of the following points:

1 point: For stating a minimum at x = 3.

1 point: For correct justification

f'(x) < 0 for 0 < x < 3 and f'(x) > 0 for x > 3

Therefore, f has a relative minimum at x = 3.

The response earns both of the following points:

1 point: For stating a minimum at x = 3.

1 point: For correct justification

f'(x) < 0 for 0 < x < 3 and f'(x) > 0 for x > 3

Therefore, f has a relative minimum at x = 3.
